# docker-composeå®‰è£…seata-serveræœåŠ¡ç«¯

version: "3"
services:
  mysql-slave:
    image: seataio/seata-server:1.4.2
    container_name: seata-server-MQZ
    restart: on-failure
    ports:
      - "8091:8091"
    volumes:
      - /root/mqz/seata-server/conf:/root/seata-config
      - /root/mqz/seata-server/logs:/root/logs
    privileged: true
    environment:
      - SEATA_IP=192.168.2.9
      - SEATA_CONFIG_NAME=file:/root/seata-config/registry
      #seata-serverå¯åŠ¨çš„IPï¼Œç”¨äºå‘æ³¨å†Œä¸­å¿ƒæ³¨å†Œä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ä½¿ç”¨å®¹å™¨IPå¯èƒ½æ— æ³•ä¸å®¢æˆ·ç«¯é€šè®¯ï¼›
      #æ­¤ipåç»­è¿è¿‡æ¥çš„clientéœ€è¦ç”¨åˆ°ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯ä¸Šé¢ç¬¬2ç‚¹ä¸­clientç«¯è¿æ¥çš„seataæœåŠ¡çš„é…ç½®ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚
      #æˆ‘è¿™é‡Œé…ç½®çš„æ˜¯seataæ‰€åœ¨çš„dockerå®¹å™¨ä¹‹å¤–çš„linuxè™šæ‹Ÿæœºip

# æŠŠseata-serveræ³¨å†Œåˆ°nacos

  • file.conf
## transaction log store, only used in seata-server
store {
  ## store mode: fileã€dbã€redis
  mode = "db"
  ## rsa decryption public key
  publicKey = ""
  db {
    ## the implement of javax.sql.DataSource, such as DruidDataSource(druid)/BasicDataSource(dbcp)/HikariDataSource(hikari) etc.
    datasource = "druid"
    ## dbTypeçš„ç±»å‹ï¼š mysqlã€oracleã€postgresqlã€h2ã€oceanbase ç­‰
    dbType = "mysql"
    driverClassName = "com.mysql.jdbc.Driver"
    # å¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨mysqlå­˜å‚¨æ•°æ®ï¼Œå»ºè®®åœ¨jdbcè¿æ¥å‚æ•°ä¸­æ·»åŠ rewriteBatchedStatements=true
    # seataæœåŠ¡ç«¯éœ€è¦çš„æ•°æ®åº“
    url = "jdbc:mysql://106.12.187.16:3306/seata?rewriteBatchedStatements=true"
    user = "root"
    password = "mengqizhang"
    minConn = 5
    maxConn = 100
    # seata æœåŠ¡ç«¯éœ€è¦çš„ä¸‰å¼ è¡¨ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å­˜æ”¾åœ¨seataæ•°æ®åº“ï¼ˆéä¸šåŠ¡åº“ä¸­ï¼‰ï¼Œä¸šåŠ¡åº“è¿˜éœ€è¦undo_log
    globalTable = "global_table"
    branchTable = "branch_table"
    lockTable = "lock_table"
    queryLimit = 100
    maxWait = 5000
  }
}

service.vgroupMapping.my_test_tx_group=default
store.mode=db
store.db.datasource=druid
store.db.dbType=mysql
store.db.driverClassName=com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
store.db.url=jdbc:mysql://106.12.187.16:3306/seata?useUnicode=true&rewriteBatchedStatements=true
store.db.user=root
store.db.password=mengqizhang
store.db.minConn=5
store.db.maxConn=30
store.db.globalTable=global_table
store.db.branchTable=branch_table
store.db.distributedLockTable=distributed_lock
store.db.queryLimit=100
store.db.lockTable=lock_table
store.db.maxWait=5000

  • registry.conf
registry {
  # file ã€nacos ã€eurekaã€redisã€zkã€consulã€etcd3ã€sofa
  type = "nacos"
  nacos {
    application = "seata-server"
    # nacos çš„æ³¨å†Œåœ°å€
    serverAddr = "139.155.180.57:8848"
    # è¿™é‡Œçš„groupéœ€è¦å’Œä¸šåŠ¡æœåŠ¡çš„groupä¸€è‡´
    group = "SEATA_GROUP"
    # nacoså‘½åç©ºé—´ï¼Œå»ºè®®ä¸ä½¿ç”¨public
    namespace = "c81969fd-f5eb-496a-b03d-ed8a49413193"
    cluster = "default"
    # nacosçš„ç™»é™†å¯†ç 
    username = "nacos"
    password = "mengqizhang"
  }
}

config {
  # fileã€nacos ã€apolloã€zkã€consulã€etcd3
  type = "nacos"

  nacos {
    serverAddr = "139.155.180.57:8848"
    namespace = "c81969fd-f5eb-496a-b03d-ed8a49413193"
    group = "SEATA_GROUP"
    username = "nacos"
    password = "mengqizhang"
    dataId = "seataServer.properties"
  }
}
